head-description: Bludit PRO is Bludit with remarkable extra plugins. The principal idea of Bludit PRO is to offer extra content, inviting the user to make a donation to the project.
bludit-license: Bludit is released under the MIT license
donations-paragraph1: If you like Bludit and is useful for you, please consider donating to the project.
donations-paragraph2: Below, there are some links for differents platforms. Thank you!
paypal-paragraph2: Or send directly to my email account
payoneer-paragraph1: You can send the donation to my email or ask me for another alternative such as Global Bank Account.
skrill-paragraph1: Send the donation directly to my email account
bitcoins-paragraph1: You can send the donation to my Bitcoin Wallet Address
